Dmg. Cute
Dmg. Cute
CUTE damage causes an increased critical hit chance!
Dmg. Charming
Dmg. Charming
CHARMING damage temporarily increases your CRUSH's other damage multipliers!
Dmg. Clever
Dmg. Clever
CLEVER damage temporarily decreases the TEMPO of the battle!
Dmg. Comedic
Dmg. Comedic
COMEDIC damage restores your health. But missing will hurt!
Dmg. Colorless
Dmg. Colorless
COLORLESS damage has no special properties.

-------------SPELLS SPELLS SPELLS SPELLS SPELLS-------------
?????\nUnlock: Do something silly and funny
DEBUG
Press $0 to pick 'DEBUG'\n'WOW!'
Endear
A standard, slow projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Endear'\n'Simple bits of affection will work on almost anyone.'
Dote
A burst of two short-range projectiles
Press $0 to pick 'Dote'\n'Use special attention to really melt your CRUSH's heart!'
Allure
A fast and pulling long-range projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Allure'\n'Give your CRUSH a captivating glance to draw them in for more...'
Confidence
A strong, heavy projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Confidence'\n'Head-on moves will prevent your CRUSH from having to chase you.'
Dazzle
A powerful explosive projectile with massive recoil
Press $0 to pick 'Dazzle'\n'Be dramatic if you must! Blow your CRUSH away!'
Candor
Three slow drilling projectiles, shot behind your back
Press $0 to pick 'Candor'\n'The most powerful moves may also leave you open and honest.'
Geek Out
A long-lasting projectile that gains damage each time it bounces
Press $0 to pick 'Geek Out'\n'Ramble about your interests... if you've got the time.'
Foresight
A floaty projectile that doubles its damage over time
Press $0 to pick 'Foresight'\n'Think ahead! A little insight can go a long way...'
Intuition
An slow projectile that jumps forward after a moment
Press $0 to pick 'Intuition'\n'Read between the lines. You know more about your CRUSH than you may think...'
One-Liner
A high-knockback projectile that cannot turn
Press $0 to pick 'One-Liner'\n'Straight-shot, no-nonsense. Just aim carefully.'
Pickup Line
A decelerating projectile with high recoil and negative gravity
Press $0 to pick 'Pickup Line'\n'If subtlety won't get you far... try being direct!'
Icebreaker
Three short-range drilling projectiles that converge to a point
Press $0 to pick 'Icebreaker'\n'Even simple jokes can help your CRUSH with letting their guard down.'
Stumble
A weak projectile with no special properties
Press $0 to pick 'Stumble'\n'Mistakes can be endearing, if nothing else...'
Inside Joke
A harmless bumper that boosts the power of bumped projectiles
Press $0 to pick 'Inside Joke'\n'Setup and punchline... A fundamental rule of comedy.'
Tidbits
A straight-shot of three projectiles with different speeds
Press $0 to pick 'Tidbits'\n'Never disregard the little details that make you unique.'
Play It Straight
Causes COMEDIC projectiles to no longer heal or cause self-damage
Press $0 to pick 'Play It Straight'\n'The best pranksters know when to get serious.'
Under Pressure
Boosts a projectile's CHARMING damage and initial speed based on the TEMPO
Press $0 to pick 'Under Pressure'\n'It's attractive to keep a level head, even when things get tense.'
Cherish
Increases the damaging radius of a projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Cherish'\n'Don't let anyone just sidestep your love... Open your arms even wider!'
Snapshot
A projectile may swap places with you right before you take damage
Press $0 to pick 'Snapshot'\n'The best moments are fleeting... So take lots of pictures.'
Adorable Glance
Boosts the CUTE damage of a projectile by 50%
Press $0 to pick 'Adorable Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them adore you...'
Fetching Glance
Boosts the CHARMING damage of a projectile by 50%
Press $0 to pick 'Fetching Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them swoon for you...'
Witty Glance
Boosts the CLEVER damage of a projectile by 50%
Press $0 to pick 'Witty Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them admire you...'
Humorous Glance
Boosts the COMEDIC damage of a projectile by 50%
Press $0 to pick 'Humorous Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll make them laugh...'
Mysterious Glance
Boosts a random damage type of a projectile by 100%
Press $0 to pick 'Mysterious Glance'\n'Accentuate your actions with a look that'll keep them on their toes...'
Double Down
Acts as a copy of the next (other) modifier on this wand
Press $0 to pick 'Double Down'\n'Find out what they like... then commit to it until they swoon.'
Triple Down
Acts as two copies of the next (other) modifier on this wand
Press $0 to pick 'Triple Down'\n'Find out what they like... and don't relent even once they've swooned!'
Flaunt
Creates a blast of sparks on a projectile's first two bounces
Press $0 to pick 'Flaunt'\n'When you know that the time is right, don't hesitate to strut your stuff!'
Kindle
Converts half of a projectile's highest damage type into flame
Press $0 to pick 'Kindle'\n'Light that fire in their heart, and they might never forget your love...'
Poke
A projectile will accelerate and imitate a bounce once it gets too far away from you
Press $0 to pick 'Poke'\n'Some folks are just too shy, too indirect... but initiative is attractive.'
Bond
A field that holds and launches your other projectiles
Press $0 to pick 'Bond'\n'Don't miss your chance to spend time with those you love.'
Hasten
Greatly boosts a projectile's initial speed, but decreases its lifetime
Press $0 to pick 'Hasten'\n'Sometimes, you'll need to be quick to win someone's heart...'
Patience
Greatly boosts a projectile's lifetime, but decreases its initial speed
Press $0 to pick 'Patience'\n'Sometimes, you'll need diligence to win someone's heart...'
Gut-Buster
Balances the knockback and COMEDIC damage of a projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Gut-Buster'\n''
Heart-Piercer
Divides a projectile's damage and knockback by 6, but grants piercing to it
Press $0 to pick 'Heart-Piercer'\n' '
SUPERAFFECTIONATE
A slow projectile that propels itself in your wand's direction when you hold alt fire
Press $0 to pick 'SUPERAFFECTIONATE'\n' '
THE LOOK
A long-lasting beam that points in your wand direction and overcharges damage multipliers
Press $0 to pick 'THE LOOK'\n'We've all used it.'
HYPERFOCUS
A bouncy and kickable orb that captures TEMPO until it bursts
Press $0 to pick 'HYPERFOCUS'\n'Keep your concentration, and the good times may never pass...'
ALL-TIMER
A dangerous self-homing disc that permanently steals your CRUSH's max health on hit
Press $0 to pick 'ALL-TIMER'\n'A legendary joke, unforgettable... if you don't screw it up.'
Curveball
Increases a projectile's COMEDIC damage and grants it a wiggly path
Press $0 to pick 'Curveball'\n'Keep that punchline a secret... misdirect until it's ready!'
Punchline
Causes a projectile to charge with COMEDIC damage if you hold the fire button
Press $0 to pick 'Punchline'\n'Wait for it... wait for it... now!'
Sequitur
Causes a projectile to wrap and mimic a bounce once it reaches the edge of the arena
Press $0 to pick 'Sequitur'\n'Keep the conversation flowing! Follow leads and tidbits...'
Entice
Causes a projectile to attract nearby projectiles for a moment once it expires
Press $0 to pick 'Entice'\n''
Repartee
Halves a projectile's damage, but allows it to break your CRUSH's projectiles on contact
Press $0 to pick 'Repartee'\n'Knowing just what to say... A conversational counterattack.'
Ad-Lib
Grants a projectile a small chance to convert terrain into a powerful COMEDIC missile
Press $0 to pick 'Ad-Lib'\n'Be ready to fashion your comedic material out of anything.'
Divides a projectile's damage evenly between CUTE, CHARMING, CLEVER and COMEDIC
Press $0 to pick '??'\n''
Halves the air friction and gravity of a projectile
Press $0 to pick '??'\n''
Causes a projectile to create an unmodified copy of itself when it dies
Press $0 to pick '??'\n''
Pop-up
Halves a projectile's lifetime, but teleports you to it when it expires
Press $0 to pick 'Pop-up'\n'You're a pleasant surprise!'
Savant
Increases a projectile's CLEVER damage for every LuaComponent it has
Press $0 to pick 'Savant'\n'Some maneuvers... are only for the nerds to understand.'
Ardor
A red-hot piercing fan that applies flame without damaging
Press $0 to pick 'Ardor'\n
Big-Hearted
Grants 25 extra max HP
Press $0 to pick 'Big-Hearted'\n''
Clingy
Grants a 25% chance for each spell to be salvaged after this encounter
Press $0 to pick 'Clingy'\n'Hold on tight... don't let go!'
Slick
Grants 25% horizontal movement speed, with slight slipperiness
Press $0 to pick 'Slick'\n'Think fast, and don't slip up!'
Warm
Grants 20% fire damage and a 10% chance to ignite each projectile you fire
Press $0 to pick 'Warm'\n''
Slapstick
Grants a 25% chance to release a blast of sparks when you take damage
Press $0 to pick 'Show-off'\n''
Cadence
Slowly regenerates your health relative to the current TEMPO
Press $0 to pick 'Cadence'\n''
Bide
Every 20th projectile you fire will deal critical damage
Press $0 to pick 'Bide'\n''
Hindsight
Copies every (other) passive spell you have equipped, but slowly drains your HP
Press $0 to pick 'Hindsight'\n'The past can hurt. But you need to learn from it!'
Commit
Increases both the healing and self-damage of COMEDIC projectiles by 50%
Press $0 to pick 'Commit'\n'To the bit.'
Tease
A strange projectile that creates a bonus heart for you to hit
Press $0 to pick 'Tease'\n'Trick them into letting down their guard... fluster them!'
Puppy-Dog Eyes
Grants projectile repulsion relative to how much damage you've taken recently
Press $0 to pick 'Puppy-Dog Eyes'\n'Guaranteed to get the sympathy vote - it's irresistible!'
Glomp
A short-ranged lunging projectile
Press $0 to pick 'Glomp'\n'Look it up.'
An fast piercing wave that grows larger along its path
Press $0 to pick '??'\n'Look it up.'
-------------AMULETS AMULETS AMULETS AMULETS AMULETS-------------
Golden Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The golden sheen is comfortable and familiar.\nGain 2% CHARGE each second.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Diamond Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The diamond shines brightly when angled towards light.\nGain 1% CHARGE multiplied by the current TEMPO each second.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Emerald Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The emerald color brings out fond memories.\nAvoid damage for 10 seconds to gain 30% CHARGE.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Copper Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The smell of the copper reminds you of old bloodshed...\nGain 8% CHARGE for every 5 damage you take.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Brass Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The aged brass is reminiscent of bullet casings...\nGain 5% CHARGE for every 20 damage your CRUSH takes.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Silver Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The sharpened silver could cut you, if you were careless.\nGraze close to 5 projectiles to gain 20% CHARGE.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Fool's Gold Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The golden surface is polished and clean, but has an odd smell...\nEvery 5 seconds, gain some CHARGE?\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Lightgem Amulet

A necklace and amulet. The luminous surface provides a powerful warmth against your chest.\nStart encounters with 500% CHARGE, but never gain any more.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Darkgem Amulet
A necklace and amulet. The pitch-black surface lets no light escape from its surface.\nStart encounters with -500% CHARGE, and gain 10% each second.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Amulet of Yendor
A necklace and amulet. The glassy mithril surface feels like it may last forever...\nEvery 5 seconds, gain 15% CHARGE and lose 1 health.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Amulet of Yendor
A necklace and amulet. The mithril surface feels a little less reflective than usual.\nEvery 5 seconds, gain 15% CHARGE and lose 1 health.\nA small item could fit in the compartment inside.
Memento: Parry

A small, foul-smelling ball of meat. Channels defense as offense.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate a PARRY.\nReflect nearby hostile projectiles for a brief moment as powerful homing attacks.
Memento: Focus

A chunk of soft green flesh. Possesses regenerative capabilities.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate FOCUS.\nBecome immobile until the FOCUS is complete to regenerate a portion of your max health.
Memento: Plasma

A red LED light, everlasting. Grants an attack of pure energy.\nPress [KICK] to spend up to $0% CHARGE and initiate PLASMA.\nFire a devastating plasma beam from your wand until you take damage or [KICK] again.
Memento: Dash
A delicately carved stone egg. Heightens control of one's own body.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate a DASH.\nMove swiftly for a short period of time and take reduced damage.
Memento: Slowdown

A blue iridescent scale. Causes feelings of patience and tranquility.\nPress [KICK] to spend up to $0% CHARGE and initiate SLOWDOWN.\nSlow all nearby projectiles for a time, healing upon successful grazes.
Memento: Berserk
A tuft of sheep's wool. Brings memories of gain and loss.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate BERSERK.\nFire your wands rapidly and uncontrollably, but stillness drains your health.
Memento: Linkage

A shard of the Sauvan Ydin. Amplifies connections of all kinds.\nPress [KICK] to spend $0% CHARGE and initiate LINKAGE.\nChain yourself to your CRUSH's heart, increasing their damage multipliers over time.
